detaileddescription.para: ECC detected fixable (one bit) error in read data from RAM.
ECC detected non-fixable (multiple bits) error in read data from RAM.

briefdescription.para: Function for clearing the specified RAMC event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

briefdescription.para: Function for retrieving the state of the RAMC event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
The event has not been generated.

briefdescription.para: Function for returning the address of the specified RAMC event register.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting number of waitstates for a read from the RAM.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting number of waitstates for a read from the RAM.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting base address for secure access area.

simplesect.para: When the SECENABLE is enabled, any non-secure accesses to the address within the RAM which are above or equal to the base address generates an error.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Base address. Writes to the bits [11:0] are ignored and are read as zero. Similarly, the MSB size depends on the size of the RAM, writes to those MSB above the size are ignored and are read as zero.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting base address for secure access area.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting secure access restrictions.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
True if secure access restrictions are to be enabled, false otherwise

briefdescription.para: Function for checking secure access restrictions.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
